mapper.sql: id AS "id", task_number AS "taskNumber", material_type_id AS "materialTypeId", material_id AS "materialId", m_batch AS "mBatch", m_number AS "mNumber", stock_id AS "stockId",turnover_id AS "turnoverId",turnover_number AS "turnoverNumber", loca_number AS "locaNumber", operator AS "operator", operation_time AS "operationTime", task_state AS "taskState", create_time AS "createTime", update_time AS "updateTime"
mapper.select:
select
from wms_cabinet2_replenishment_task where 1 = 1
and task_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.taskNumber},'%')

select
from wms_cabinet2_replenishment_task where 1 = 1
and task_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.taskNumber},'%')

SELECT wms_cabinet2_replenishment_task.id AS "id", wms_cabinet2_replenishment_task.task_number AS "taskNumber", wms_cabinet2_replenishment_task.material_type_id AS "materialTypeId", wms_cabinet2_replenishment_task.material_id AS "materialId", wms_cabinet2_replenishment_task.m_batch AS "mBatch", wms_cabinet2_replenishment_task.m_number AS "mNumber", wms_cabinet2_replenishment_task.stock_id AS "stockId", wms_cabinet2_replenishment_task.turnover_id AS "turnoverId", wms_cabinet2_replenishment_task.turnover_number AS "turnoverNumber", wms_cabinet2_replenishment_task.loca_number AS "locaNumber", wms_cabinet2_replenishment_task.operator AS "operator", wms_cabinet2_replenishment_task.operation_time AS "operationTime", wms_cabinet2_replenishment_task.task_state AS "taskState", wms_cabinet2_replenishment_task.create_time AS "createTime", wms_cabinet2_replenishment_task.update_time AS "updateTime", wms_material_type.material_type AS "materialType", wms_material_type.material_name AS "materialName", wms_material_type.material_sku AS "materialSku", wms_material_type.sizes as "sizes", wms_user.user_name as "userName", wms_user.serial_number as "serialNumber", wms_user.work_team as "workTeam" FROM wms_cabinet2_replenishment_task LEFT JOIN wms_material_type on wms_cabinet2_replenishment_task.material_type_id=wms_material_type.id LEFT JOIN wms_user ON wms_cabinet2_replenishment_task.operator=wms_user.id where 1 = 1
and wms_cabinet2_replenishment_task.task_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.taskNumber},'%')
and wms_material_type.sizes like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.sizes},'%')
and wms_user.serial_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.serialNumber},'%')
and wms_user.user_name like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.userName},'%')
and wms_cabinet2_replenishment_task.task_state like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.taskState},'%')

select
from wms_cabinet2_replenishment_task where 1 = 1
and task_number like CONCAT('%',#{paramCondition.taskNumber},'%')
mapper.update: update wms_cabinet2_replenishment_task set task_state = #{state} where id = #{id}
